sect2.title: Introduction to lrzsz
sect2.para: The lrzsz package is for UNIX communication, providing the XMODEM, YMODEM, and ZMODEM file transfer protocols.

sect2.title: Installation of lrzsz
sect2.para: Apply several patches to fix various configuration, build, and security issues:

screen.userinput: patch -Np1 -i ../lrzsz-autotools.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../lrzsz-implicit-decl.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../lrzsz-&lrzsz-version;-automake-1.12.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../lrzsz-&lrzsz-version;-automake-1.13.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../lrzsz-&lrzsz-version;-gettext-0.20.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../lrzsz-&lrzsz-version;-AR.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../lrzsz-&lrzsz-version;-configure-clang16.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../lrzsz-&lrzsz-version;-gettext-0.22.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../lrzsz-&lrzsz-version;-c99.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../lrzsz-&lrzsz-version;-fix-integer-overflow.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../lrzsz-&lrzsz-version;-c23.patch

sect2.para: Add and remove files, then regenerate the autoconf files:

screen.userinput: touch config.rpath && rm -vf missing && rm -vf acconfig.h && autoreconf -fiv

sect2.para: Install lrzsz by executing the following commands:

screen.userinput:
make install &&
for x in {r,s}{b,x,z} ; do ln -svf l${x} /usr/bin/${x} && ln -svf l${x:0:1}z.1 /usr/share/man/man1/${x}.1 && [ "${x:1:1}" = "z" ] || ln -svf l${x:0:1}z.1 /usr/share/man/man1/l${x}.1 done

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: touch config.rpath: This command creates an empty file that automake wishes to use, but is missing from the distribution.
rm -vf missing: This command deletes the missing file as it is too old to be used. automake, when executing autoreconf, will regenerate this file that will be current.
rm -vf acconfig.h: autoheader does not like the acconfig.h file existing, so this command deletes it.
--disable-nls: This parameter disables NLS support as it is broken for this package due to missing files.
for i in {r,s}{b,x,z} ; do...: This command block creates compatibility symlinks for the original rzsz package, which is required for .
